document.full_text: landscape maintenance equipment company toro is voluntarily recalling thousands of its snowblowers and mowers due to a fire risk, the u.s. and canadian governments said on tuesday.
document.title: thousands of toro snowblowers and mowers recalled: government
lines_and_colors: landscape maintenance equipment company toro is voluntarily recalling thousands of its snowblowers and mowers due to a fire risk, the u.s. and canadian governments said on tuesday.
